price: 47. Nabiyow tama korosuk yoh warisa ixxic:Yallih digaalá garcik hinnay intih abalih siinit temeetek, koroositeeh daalimiinih yan marak- sa finqittam tanii? matan.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illā al-qawmu al-ẓālimūna
